title: WTB: Low grade Old Judge N172 Pittsburg Alleghenys
author: markf31

posts.post_title: WTB: Low grade Old Judge N172 Pittsburg Alleghenys
posts.post_content: I am looking for 1 maybe 2 cards, in a low grade PSA 2 or 3/SGC 30 or 40. A nice looking PSA 1/SGC 10 could interest me as well. No specific player in mind, just a Pittsburg Alleghenys player.
